title: Mailvox: Christians are polytheists
author: VD
content_html:
Kim gang a bit agley:

Top Ten Signs You’re a Fundamentalist Christian

10 – You vigorously deny the existence of thousands of gods claimed by other religions, but feel outraged when someone denies the existence of yours….

I mentioned this a few days ago, prior to Kim gracing this blog with her attention. To repeat in brief: Christianity is NOT a monotheistic religion. Even a cursory review of the Bible will demonstrate that Christians believe in a multitude of gods, but worship only the Triune God of Father, Son and Holy Spirit.

Were this not the case, one would have a very difficult time explaining Paul’s “rulers and authorities”, Jesus Christ’s “prince of this world” and David’s mighty congregation of “the gods”, of whom God stands in judgment.

Thus, the common atheist dig about “believing in one less god than you” is not only a petty critique, but demonstrably ignorant one.
